website_summaries.verdict: This humane dog training collar is a breeze to set up so it can begin to teach your dog not to bark straight away.
pros: LED sensitivity indicator is easy to read and simple to set
Makes a beeping noise and/or vibrates
cons: Designed for dogs weighing 7 kilograms or more

customer_reviews.title: Best one tried
customer_reviews.text: We already had a collar which used batteries. I got this one as it’s rechargeable and you can change the settings. Came with instructions and a different collar. We used it for a short while and now only have to show the dogs and they stop
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant !
customer_reviews.text: I have four dogs, two of which have been disturbing my sleep by barking - constantly - from around 5.30 😡😡. The first night I put their collars on when I put them to bed and hoped for the best. I heard each of them bark once the next morning and then stop. They haven't barked in the morning since. Not once. Bliss. Pure bliss.
customer_reviews.author: michelle jones

customer_reviews.title: An Ear saver, brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Our Doberman is nearly 9yr old and he favourite past time is barking..... At anything, we have tried everything known to man to curb it, the SUPERNIGHT COLLAR has been sent from the Dog God!!! Alittle tricky to set up, but once activated and placed in the right position around his neck, this collar has transformed him, he barks once , the collar vibrates and flashes, he looks bemused looking around for the noise and the flashing, he's even tried barking quietly to see if he can stop it activating... No can do, a quieter house, a quieter dog. Wish I known about it 8 yrs ago when we rescued him from the dogs home, bless Highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Returned unused purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this but did not realise it relied on air and not water. Also, inside the packaging comes with a warning not to use on your dog for long periods as it can cause damage to your pets skin, which made me feel uncomfortable and had to return. Also, you definitely need to purchase the air can to fill it. Instructions are pretty clear and easy, might be a bit bulky for smaller dogs, although I did get it for my lab. Was not able to try it out so could not review on efficiency and effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Thao

customer_reviews.title: Works great on short haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs, one husky, and one Doberman. This product works great on my Doberman but has a little trouble picking up the husky barks. I have turned it to the highest sensitivity and it still only works occasionally. This is probably due to all the fur blocking the sensor. Other than that it is a brilliant product that gives you the option to change the vibration and sensitivity to suit your dog! The battery life is okay but could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Punnett

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This was a last resort to stop the constant barking of one of my dogs when he wanted to br in garden and then barking when in garden. Put the collar on, he started to bark the collar beeped and vibrated and that was it, he was quiet the rest of the night, peace and quiet!
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Suprised!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first but it it did actually work! It took a Little while for my dog to get used to it, and I wouldn't say he completely stopped barking but the continues barking did stop! Didn't think it would work so supprises it did! Lots of different frequency settings also 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Maria Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Worked immediately
customer_reviews.text: Worked immediately. My dog had been barking when new people arrived at the house. We tried a lot of different thing but thought we would try this training collar. Had friends visit and within a couple of minutes the barks stopped. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lorcán Mac

customer_reviews.title: Stop barking Collar
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well and it has the effect it was brought for . The fact it’s rechargeable makes it much more convent than having to replace batteries all the time . Very pleased would recommend it any one having the same problem we was .
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Works for Lili
customer_reviews.text: I wore it on Li Li (my small bulldog).She looked no more anxiety.She always barked to the passerby and other animals.She wouldn't have done that a long time ago.When she barked,the device will send out a sound just like "bi" and no spray.If she barks continuously,she will be sprayed definitely.For no more be sprayed,she really stops it.Now only looks the collar,will she stop it even though without wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: skye

customer_reviews.title: Might work for some dogs
customer_reviews.text: Well found this product for my dog at least a total waste of money if you have a highly strung dog I would not even think about buying this as on my noisy Pug was useless
customer_reviews.author: janice rowlinson

customer_reviews.title: His barking soon pipes down
customer_reviews.text: Took my mums dog a while to understand what was going on but he has now started to associate the noise with his barking and soon pipes down.
customer_reviews.author: NIC

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but ....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use waiting for a replacement all though it worked great stopped the dog barking for sure but broke on the second day as would not charge hope this is one of blip
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent, easy to use and stops my wee dug immediately. It’s harmless but effective *****
customer_reviews.author: Paula Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartments!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this on my border collie that barks insane amounts. I am definitely against collars that hurt but this just plays noise and corrects her and Stops her. She hasn’t quite learned when it’s off not to bark, because I take it off when she’s in the crate and outside when playing. But, inside an apartment, it REALLY helps!
customer_reviews.author: MS JOANNE COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Returned as not switching on
customer_reviews.text: Product would not turn on after charging. Returned and given full refund
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, not sensitive enough
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Don't buy. You have to blow on it really REALLY hard for it to work and my dogs bark isn't anywhere near sensitive enough to set it off, despite having a loud bark. Smaller dogs definitely wouldn't work. Really wish I hadn't wasted my money, form buy it's not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. A. Longmate

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd got one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical buying this. Assumed it wouldn't work on my dog. I can't believe how effective it is! Stopped my dog barking instantly. Very humane too (i even tried it myself!) Not very user friendly but got there in the end. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: david stacey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we powered it up and placed it on our dog she stopped barking. In the last week of use, she has gotten used to it and only emits one bark, with a verbal command of stop she stops, this has never happened before. I believe this product is worth the money to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LaynieFus

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth it’s weight in gold. It stopped my Dane, who was addicted to barking, immediately. It was a huge relief.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget- peace at last!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, quality product and nicely packaged. Very quick and easy to set up and worked instantly- no more incessant barking. I am very impressed especially as this collar causes no distress to my pet but just gives him a gentle reminder not to bark
customer_reviews.author: n akram

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money, very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Confusing to set up , poor quality, worked twice and failed , don’t waste your money .....
customer_reviews.author: Peter Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Collar works great! No pain!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar! Works exactly as described. I was a little skeptical at first but it proved itself. At this point, all we have to do is show her the collar and settles right down.
customer_reviews.author: Haresh Bhangal

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I e had one of these before and it really helped my dog. However this one didn't beep nor spray! The light flashed but that was it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mrs s.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This does not work despite us trying everything suggested. Do not waste your money😠
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Prompt service
customer_reviews.text: We read all the reviews that were very encouraging but it does not seem to work for our pooch. We’ve tried adjusting the sensitivity but no difference. Our cockapoo barks but the collar doesn’t activate. We contacted the seller who promptly dealt with our issue by sending a replacement product. This now seems to be working as stated
customer_reviews.author: Mr CR Springett

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the instructions and nothing. Doesn’t work. The lights are on, it’s adjusted it’s full of spray but absolutely nothing happens when my dog barks.
customer_reviews.author: Lalapettifer

customer_reviews.title: Ours is faulty
customer_reviews.text: This collar doesn’t work. It worked once in the first day but not again since. I’ve tried to email the address on here but it was undelivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harmless
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the old one.Although the old one has many function like vibration and shock.My honey was burned out because of the shock.I hate that and give the bad star to the old seller.Rather than the old,this one really gentle.Only a spray makes him stop.It does not hurt your dog.He will be confused about why there is water and if you do something to lead him,he will have good behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Louise

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with fast result!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! My dog is a different dog after putting this on. It trained him almost immediately. He is 43 lbs and was a constant barker of people walking by the house and “guarding” the front door. We put this collar on and he completely stopped barking. He also went back to being off-leash in our yard. He listens so much better to our commands. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: John Davies

customer_reviews.title: An amazing dog collar
customer_reviews.text: He didn't respond i took him out today it was quiet and he used to bark at every other dog he saw and then he would run at it and bite but when he put the collar on it all went away and he even got close to the dogs that he didn't like and it was just amazing
customer_reviews.author: Heather Chasteen

customer_reviews.title: humane option
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, humane way to curb your dog's barking. It is easy to get set up and is a really nice size for either small, medium, or large dogs. The display is large enough to make it easy to see too. I like this option over the shock option. It is quite effective too.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Smith

customer_reviews.title: This one works!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog barks at the neighbors. We got an anti-barking device that we hung from the bird feeder pole, which was hardly effective at all. They returned it and bought this collar. It absolutely works.
customer_reviews.author: SharaiMa

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lurcher cross bearded collie who is 2 years old. He is very vocal with anything passing our gate, much to our annoyance. I put the collar on him and after twice barking and coming in the house smelling of citronella, he has stopped barking. I wouldn’t have believed it, and I was very sceptical about buying it. Now I don’t even have to turn it on, just have him wear it during the day and not a peep out of him. Worked really really well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Helen T

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The dog bark collar was a waste off Money as it doesn't work I sent the item back and have heard nothing back of amazon that was 2 days ago but if your thinking on buying this item please don't as it's no good thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ross Blair

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work on my cocker spaniels
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 collars. Do not work on cocker spaniels! The spray didn’t come out every time they barked & when it did work the dogs just shook their heads & then continued to bark.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Thipthorp

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Has done the trick nicely with our dog, even the sight of the collar now makes him think twice!
customer_reviews.author: maximus1984

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't very bark sensitive. I'm not sure it even works to be honest!
customer_reviews.author: Charl.Y

product_meta.title: Ruolan Anti Barking Device，Dog Trainer Tool Dog Bark 50 FT Range Control Device Anti-bark Deterrent，Indoor Outdoor Stop Bark Security for Dogs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
